title: Failed to connect patch 6.17
body: This is what pops up after the game goes into loading. I can't start a match cause i can't connect to the server :/ and i dont know what the issue is. I played a few matches today before 6.17 i patched just now and first match i try this happens -.-

replies.body: Well i now noticed i cant create a custom either http://prntscr.com/c9v80g this is great {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
just restart your client and it should be ok
I have the same problem as you, first match of today on eune and this happens and I cant play there anymore, but euw works for me fine, so rly dunno what to do...

It looks like your network has started to have problems establishing a connection to our servers.  I suggest going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help remedy this.  Hopefully, this will help get you back in game!
